amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore funding to current levels for cleanup of Formerly Utilized Defense Sites.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Formerly Utilized Defense Sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
